ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: Just curious, but what did you do when you logged in and all your guild enchanters were busy in other groups post 55? Any hints on where you played around? The
ygData.messageBody:
Just curious, but what did you do when you logged in and all your guild
enchanters were busy in other groups post 55? Any hints on where you
played around? The only "pickup" groups I play in are put together
mostly from guild members, and when there's no enchanter, the places to
go at 55+ are pretty slim. I can go solo in Tim Deep, or team up with
casters in Skyfire, or try to put something together in Karnors or
Sebilis. But Karnors is getting green and if the 3 easy spots in Sebilis
are taken, without an enchanter it's pretty slim pickings.

On Wed, Oct 11/00, "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...> wrote:
> both sides are strong arguments, and both jeff and kitasi are definitely on
> oppopsite sides of the spectrum, with a lot of us somewhere in between. i
> think kitasi's gripe is not that he is "always grouped with enchanter,
> cleric, AND snarer" but that most players want to be or refuse to play
> otherwise. i haven't run into these problems because i am lucky not to
> ever, ever, ever be in pick-up groups.
>

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
